description: AI Signal Orchestrator Demo Output - SOL/USDC Momentum Breakout
scenario: 15m timeframe momentum push on SOL/USDC with high ATR, solid liquidity, no rug flags

signals.thesis: Strong momentum continuation in uptrend with mid volatility. EMA fast above slow, RSI in bullish zone (62.5), price breaking recent resistance. Entry zone: 141.80-143.00

conditions: EMA fast crosses below EMA slow

trade_plans.notes: Generated from momentum signal with 78% confidence. Strong momentum continuation in uptrend with mid volatility. EMA fast above slow, RSI in bullish zone (62.5), price breaking recent resistance. Entry zone: 141.80-143.00. Plan edges: 1.5R/2.5R/4R exits with 30%/40%/30% distribution.

lessons.when_it_works: Works best in uptrend with mid volatility during London session. RSI 55-70 range, EMA fast > slow, volume above average. Average R:R 2.5-3.5. Win rate historically 68% in similar conditions.
lessons.when_it_fails: Fails when volume spike is fake (low follow-through), RSI overbought (>75), or major resistance ahead. Common trap: Chasing late entries after 3%+ move. Exit reason often: false breakout reversal.
dos: Wait for clear regime confirmation (uptrend + mid/low vol)
Size position according to volatility (ATR-based stops)
Take partial profits at targets (30% at 1.5R minimum)
Trail stop after TP1 hit to breakeven
Enter within planned entry zone only
donts: Do not chase entries outside zone (max 1% slippage)
Do not ignore risk flags (rug/liquidity warnings)
Do not overtrade this setup (max 2-3 per session)
Do not hold through major resistance without adjustment
Do not skip rugcheck on new/unknown tokens
lessons.next_drill: Backtest this setup on historical SOL/USDC 15m data for 100+ samples. Focus on: (1) Optimal RSI entry range, (2) Session performance (London vs Asia), (3) Volume confirmation threshold. Log each result in journal.

output.explanation: Detected momentum signal with 78% confidence in Uptrend, mid volatility, high liquidity (London session, markup phase). Trade plan generated with 2.8:1 R:R and 42% expectancy. Risk checks passed. Entry at 142.35 with stop at 137.22 (1% account risk). Targets at 150.03 (1.5R, 30%), 155.20 (2.5R, 40%), 162.91 (4R, 30%). Invalidation below 138.50 or after 1h.

disclaimers: This is NOT financial advice. Signals and plans are educational tools only.
Always perform your own due diligence before trading.
Past performance does not guarantee future results.
Crypto trading carries significant risk of loss.
